Boilerplate:Item Set/copy

ADVERTISEMENT
From Diablo Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search

Item Set is an Item Set used most often by the Class in Diablo II.

Background[edit]

Diablo II Item Info [e]
1.10
Ilvl: 32
Trang-Oul's Avatar
[Item Set]
Set Pieces:
Trang-Oul's Guise
Trang-Oul's Scales
Trang-Oul's Girth
Trang-Oul's Claws
Trang-Oul's Wing
Tal Rasha's Adjudication
  • Two-piece Set Bonus:
    • +15% Mana Regeneration
    • +15% Mana Regeneration
  • Three-piece Set Bonus:
    • +15% Mana Regeneration
  • Four-piece Set Bonus:
    • +15% Mana Regeneration
  • Full Set Bonus:
    • +50% Resistance To All
    • +3 to All Skills
    • Goes up to 15 full bonuses.
Slots Used:
  • Head
  • Neck
  • Chest
  • Main Hand
  • Off-Hand
  • Waist
  • Hands
  • Ring 1
  • Ring 2
  • Feet
Slots Free:

Item List[edit]

Item Properties Magical Modifiers
Trang-Oul's Guise

(Bone Visage)
Ilvl: 32
  • Defense: 180-257
  • Durability: 40
  • Inv Size: 2x2
  • Required Strength: 106
  • Required Level: 65
Part of: Trang-Oul's Avatar
1.10
  • +80-100 Defense
  • +24% Faster Hit Recovery
  • Attacker Takes 20 Damage
  • +150 Mana
  • +5 Replenish Life (0.488 Life Per Second)


Media[edit]

Add gallery and whatever other media is available. Re-list the items already used in the article.

  • Full set worn


Development[edit]

This item set was introduced in Patch 1.10 together with a host of other Item Sets. Significant changes to the game made some item sets less useful and others more so. Runewords became the over-all long-term gear goal for players, taking some shine away from item sets.
